## Quarto

Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see <https://quarto.org>.

## Running Code

When you click the **Render** button a document will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this:

```{r}
library(readr)
s14_glucosa_circun <- read_csv("C:/Users/Usuario/Downloads/s14_glucosa_circun.csv")
View(s14_glucosa_circun)
data<-(s14_glucosa_circun)
data_limpia<-data[!is.na(data$glucosa),]
mean(data_limpia$glucosa)
```

```{r}
#INSTALACIÓN DE PAQUETES 
install.packages("readr")
install.packages("ggplot2")
```

```{r}
#HISTOGRAMA
hist (data_limpia$glucosa,
main = "Histograma de Glucosa",
xlab = "Nivel de Glucosa",
ylab = "Frecuencia",
breaks = 12,
col = "red")
```

```{r}
#MEDIDAS DE TENDENCIA CENTRAL
#media aritmetíca
mean(data_limpia$glucosa)
```

```{r}
#mediana
median(data_limpia$glucosa)
```

```{r}
#moda
mode_glucosa<-names(sort(table(data_limpia$glucosa), decreasing = TRUE))
```

```{r}
#HALLAMOS LAS MEDIDAS DE DISPERSIÓN 
#varianza
var(data_limpia$glucosa, na.rm = TRUE)
```

```{r}
#DESVIACIÓN ESTANDAR
sd(data_limpia$glucosa, na.rm = TRUE)
```

```{r}
#RANGO
range(data_limpia$glucosa, na.rm = TRUE)
```

```{r}
#RANGO INTERCUARTILICO
IQR(data_limpia$glucosa, na.rm = TRUE)
```

```{r}
#MEDIDAS DE POSICION
quantile(data_limpia$glucosa, probs = c(0.25, 0.75, 0.90), na.rm = TRUE)
```

```{r}
#LAS 6 PRIMERAS FILAS
head(data_limpia$glucosa)
```

```{r}
#RESUMEN
summary(data_limpia$glucosa)
```




```{r}
#DESVIACION ESTANDAR
sd(data$edad,na.rm = TRUE)
sd(data$trigliceridos,na.rm = TRUE)
```

```{r}
#RANGO
range(data$edad,na.rm = TRUE)
range(data$trigliceridos,na.rm = TRUE)
```



```{r}
#VISUALIZACION GRAFICA
```
